content: @Josh Mandel my PR at https://github.com/HL7/fhir/pull/546 is stuck (for the second time now...)
I'm stumped -- there seems to be something systematically wrong (I tried redlivering the webhook event, and recreating the PR, without success; testing with an unrelated PR is still working fine).
Anyway, I closed 546 and opened 549 in the process, in its stead...

There's also a small conflict (by now) with master for this branch, but I don't think Azure Devops cares that mergeable_state is dirty on the request. (Though it couldn't hurt to resolve @Grahame Grieve.)
(I've submitted a bug report to Azure Devops in the meantime.)
